About Me

Hello, I'm Brian Gomez and I'm a Full-Stack Developer

What I'm all about: Providing Value

I am currently a PhD student at Southeastern Baptist Theological Seminary (SEBTS) in Wake Forest, NC. All my life I have loved and been involved with various technologies, but at the end of 2019 I made the move to work in this industry as a Full-Stack Developer. In addition to my Full-Stack work, I own Encounter Web Design LLC, a Wake Forest based Web Design company. Check out Encounter Web Design here!

Encounter Web Design LLC

Owner and Developer

In 2020 I started Encounter Web Design LLC to help provide local businesses with websites that would help connect them to their customers and build their web presence. Everything is handled for the client including hosting, development, SEO, digital marketing, and more.

Freelance

Full Stack Developer

Since December 2019 I have been doing freelance Full-Stack development for clients, mainly using React.
